title: My Awkward Boss - Novel Updates
tags: Awkward Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Charismatic Protagonist   Co-Workers   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Quirky Characters
author: 이다홍
description:
On Sarah's first day of work, she gets a call from her boyfriend's number claiming it is his fiance and she is pregnant. To make matters worse, her boss has the same name as her ex boyfriend. 
  When she see's the back of her boss' head, she hits him with her purse that has two books in it, however when he turns around she realizes she has never seen his face before.

'Who are you?'
'No, who are you?'>
